item.name: roleList
item.param: data\[\d+\]\.id, data\[\d+\]\.name, data\[\d+\]\.description, data\[\d+\]\.roleResources, data\[\d+\]\.superOperator, data\[\d+\]\.roleStatus, data\[\d+\]\.roleStatus\.value, data\[\d+\]\.roleStatus\.desc, data\[\d+\]\.roleResources\[\d+\]\.resource\.id, data\[\d+\]\.roleResources\[\d+\]\.resource\.name, pagination\.begin, pagination\.pageSize, pagination\.count, pagination\.currentPage

item.name: role
item.param: id, name, description, superOperator, roleResources\[\d+\]\.resource\.id, roleResources\[\d+\]\.resource\.name
